name: Mogee
description:
The game is created from scratch with Elm programming language and is rendered on the WebGL canvas. The direction of the screens is randomly selected in real time, you can see this on a snake-like minimap in the top right corner.

This was my first game jam ever and I roughly spent 3 days in total working on it. I wanted to code the engine myself so I didn't have enough time to implement everything. However I was pretty happy to submit the playable MVP, thanks to my wife who helped me with the pixel art.

Press enter to start and arrows to move.

Check the source code here: https://github.com/w0rm/elm-mogee

I will definitely continue working on the game. If you have any suggestions, please let me know!

Credits

  • Code by Andrey Kuzmin
  • Pixel art by Nadya Kuzmina
  • Theme music by Carlos Pazuzu
